sys_script.name: FetchUserInformation

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_155a6f5c9335861094e3f15a7bba10d7
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>false</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>false</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_1383184_charityb_item</collection><condition>current.u_user_name != null && current.u_user_name != '';</condition><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="x_1383184_charityb_item">donator!=^EQ<item endquery="false" field="donator" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="!=" or="false" value=""/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>FetchUserInformation</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeBefore(current, previous /*, execute*/) {
    // Check if the user name field is filled
    if (current.user_name) {
        // Query the sys_user table to fetch user information
        var userGr = new GlideRecord('sys_user');
        if (userGr.get('user_name', current.user_name)) {
            // If user record found, populate location and contact fields
            current.location = userGr.location;
            current.contact_info = userGr.phone_number; // Example field, replace with appropriate field
        } else {
            gs.addErrorMessage('User not found'); // Display error if user not found
        }
    }
})(current, previous);
]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>lalitha</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-04-22 16:05:05</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>155a6f5c9335861094e3f15a7bba10d7</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>FetchUserInformation</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="CharityBids" source="x_1383184_charityb">bcaeeadb9369421094e3f15a7bba1090</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="CharityBids">bcaeeadb9369421094e3f15a7bba1090</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_155a6f5c9335861094e3f15a7bba10d7</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>lalitha</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-04-22 16:06:24</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=155a6f5c9335861094e3f15a7bba10d7"/></record_update>
